Posts.EditableText: Hi guys, RequestSave() is not working when playing online, do you know how to fix it?  Alternatively, how can i make the Save feature appears online? i remember there was a bar up in the screen.  Thank you
Posts.HTML: Hi guys, RequestSave() is not working when playing online, do you know how to fix it? Alternatively, how can i make the Save feature appears online? i remember there was a bar up in the screen. Thank you
